group_1.textLeft: I'm still really scared, even now.
When I imagine running out of magic and@turning into a Witch...
But I don't want to throw away hope just @because I'm afraid.
If we give up here, that'd be the end.
There has to be a way...
A way to stop Magical Girls from turning@into Witches!
It has to be possible, right?!

group_1.textRight: I'm sure we can figure it out!
(So I could grasp a future with hope in it!)

group_1.textLeft: Maybe we should talk to Kyubey. He might@know something about this...

group_1.textRight: Maybe Mami is acting like she is right now@because she found out about all of this?

group_1.textLeft: You're right, that could be! And the Wings@of the Magius, too!
Didn't you say Tsuruno and the others were@also being manipulated?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, looked like they were brainwashed.

group_1.textLeft: Of course, I knew they were up to something!

group_1.textRight: We might learn something if we look into@what they're doing.

group_1.textLeft: We can't just sit here, we need to stand up,@Sayaka!

group_1.textCenter: (She always knows just the thing to say!)

group_1.textLeft: First, I want to go see Mami and talk to@her myself!
We have to bring her back to her former@self...
Once we know what happened with her, we'll@know more about the Wings of the Magius...
Then maybe we can figure out more about@this turning into Witches stuff!

group_1.textRight: It's time to face our own fates...
Time to stand up, and fight them!

group_1.narration: And so we returned to Mitakihara,@our broken spirits rekindled.
That's when I decided to@go see a certain someone!
